name: Space Wars (itch) (XXpoomaanXX)
description:
After a top-secret intergalactic mission, your ship got trapped inside the alien's mother ship which is filled with aliens and laser traps.
Now, it is up to you to defend you ship at all costs.

Controls:
Use your mouse to move.
Left click to shoot

Game made for TriJam #71
Theme: Lasers

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Sprites: 1 hour 14 minutes (Wayyy too much time...)
Programming: 1 Hour 17 minutes
Bug Fixing: 39 minutes

Total time: 3 hours 10 minutes (I should aim for simpler mechanics...)

Sprites made by me
Sound Effects and Music taken from freesound.org and opengameart.org
